original_text: People became weak. They went from city to city to look for water. They were almost too weak to walk. There was not enough water. But still you did not start to pray to me again.’ The Lord says this!
korean_text: 두 세 성읍 사람이 어떤 성읍으로 비틀거리며 물을 마시러 가서 만족하게 마시지 못하였으나 너희가 내게로 돌아오지 아니하였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: They went from city to city
They were almost too weak to walk.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거의 걸을 수 없을 정도로 너무 약했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But still you did not start to pray to me again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여전히 당신은 나에게 다시 기도하기 시작하지 않았습니다.
